roadmap.title: Fundamentals of Blockchain Technology
roadmap.description: Gain a solid understanding of blockchain concepts, including distributed ledger technology, consensus mechanisms (Proof-of-Work, Proof-of-Stake), cryptography, smart contracts, and different blockchain platforms (e.g., Ethereum, Hyperledger Fabric, Corda).
resources: Books ("Blockchain Basics" by Daniel Drescher, "Mastering Bitcoin" by Andreas M. Antonopoulos)

roadmap.title: Programming Skills for Blockchain
roadmap.description: Learn a programming language commonly used in blockchain development, such as Solidity (for Ethereum), JavaScript (for web3 development), or Python (for scripting and data analysis). Focus on data structures, algorithms, and object-oriented programming concepts.

roadmap.title: Smart Contract Development
roadmap.description: Deepen your knowledge of smart contract development. Practice writing, deploying, and testing smart contracts on a chosen blockchain platform. Explore different development frameworks and tools (e.g., Truffle, Hardhat, Remix).

roadmap.title: Decentralized Application (DApp) Development
roadmap.description: Learn how to build decentralized applications (DApps) that interact with smart contracts.  Focus on front-end development using JavaScript frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js) and integrating them with blockchain backends.

roadmap.title: Build a Portfolio of Blockchain Projects
roadmap.description: Develop several blockchain projects to demonstrate your skills and experience. These could include simple DApps, smart contracts for specific use cases, or contributions to open-source blockchain projects.  Showcase your work on GitHub and a personal website.
resources: Blockchain Project Ideas (e.g., DeFi, NFTs, Supply Chain Management)

roadmap.title: Networking and Community Engagement
roadmap.description: Connect with other blockchain developers, attend industry events, and contribute to online communities.  Build your network and stay updated on the latest trends and advancements in the field.

roadmap.title: Specialize and Deepen Expertise
roadmap.description: Focus on a specific area within blockchain, such as DeFi, NFTs, or enterprise blockchain solutions. Deepen your knowledge and skills in that area through specialized courses, research, and project work.  Consider certifications to demonstrate your expertise.
